bio: Nikhil Kumar is a multidisciplinary artist and technologist exploring the intersection of ancient craft and digital futures. His work spans music, video, and interactive installations.
Chandler Wild is a filmmaker and creative technologist whose projects blend narrative storytelling with experimental media.
Adil Majid is a podcaster and writer focused on philosophy, technology, and the evolution of human thought.
Jon Wong is an engineer and artist working at the intersection of software, hardware, and human experience.
Kira Smith is a visual artist whose work draws on themes of memory, nature, and the persistence of the handmade.
Lance Weiler is a storyteller and experience designer pushing the boundaries of participatory media.
Chloe Kim is a multimedia artist exploring cycles of life, death, and technology through immersive installations.
Sasha Lee is a creative coder and AI researcher making playful, provocative works at the edge of machine intelligence.
Alex Rivera is a digital artist and animator whose work investigates the future of identity and virtual worlds.
Priya Desai is a sculptor and designer whose projects combine ancient materials with new fabrication techniques.
